tool.name: Dominance Ranking
tool.command:
#if $source.source_select == "pdbs" #set $compressed = 0 #set $inputFiles = $source.input_pdbs #else #set $compressed = 1 #set $inputFiles = $source.input_compressed #end if
dominance_ranking.py -i $inputFiles -a $__app__.security.encode_id( '%s' % $html_file.id ) -z $html_file -k "$html_file.files_path" -t $toolname -g $__root_dir__ -n #if $source.source_select == "pdbs" #set $names = "'" #for $name in $source.input_pdbs: $names$name.name #set $names = "," #end for $names' #else #set $names = "'" #for $name in $source.input_compressed: $names$name.name #set $names = "," #end for $names' #end if $names -f #set $fitness = "'#" #for $i, $s in enumerate( $fitness_energies ) ##rank=$i $fitness$i${s.Fitness_Energy} #set $fitness = "#" #end for $fitness' -s $compressed -x $active_jmol -y $check_structures -b $rename_atoms

param.name: input_compressed
param.label: Compressed file
param.help: A compressed file with PDB files. This tools does not accept a file with subfolders.

param.name: check_structures
param.label: Check the PDB structure with Gromacs?
param.help: Check if the Gromacs program PDB2GMX accepts the PDB file.

param.name: rename_atoms
param.label: Rename the missing atoms on the PDB file according to Gromacs?
param.help: Check if the PDB file has missing atoms according Gromacs.

param.name: active_jmol
param.label: Use Jmol visualization?
param.help: Jmol offers a 3D visualization of the molecule. You must have JavaScript enabled on your browser.
